info.title: OFAuth Access API
info.description: Managed and proxy Access endpoints under /v2/access/*

tags.name: Messages
tags.description: Access: messaging, chats, queue, and mass messaging.

tags.name: Posts
tags.description: Access: create, edit, list, and manage posts.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Access: user profiles, subscriptions, and actions.

tags.name: Vault
tags.description: Access: vault folders, media, and management.

tags.name: Self
tags.description: Access: authenticated account details and settings.

tags.name: Statistics
tags.description: Access: earnings, performance, and engagement metrics.

tags.name: Subscriptions
tags.description: Access: subscription offers, discounts, and management.

400.description: Bad Request, more information can be found in the response body.

401.description: Unauthorized - could be associated with a missing or invalid OFAuth API key.

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to access this endpoint.

500.description: Internal Server Error - could be a problem with OFAuth.

502.description: Bad Gateway - could be a problem with OFAuth.

get.description:
Get current user

**Authentication Required:** Either provide `x-connection-id` (for managed sessions) OR `x-of-cookie` + `x-of-user-agent` (for direct sessions). See [Access Reference](/reference/access#authentication) for more details.

**Permission Required:** `profile:read`

**Permission Required:** `promotions:read`
